end-text: . To get started edit index.tsx file.

service.desc: Our company offers logistics services for individuals and merchants: fast home delivery, reliable shipping to customers, and secure storage. We simplify the management of your shipments and storage.

text.text1: Fast and secure home delivery for your purchases and personal parcels.
text.text2: Efficient and reliable service to ship your products to customers.
text.text3: Secure and flexible solution to store your products in our facilities.

contact-text: Our mission is to provide you with a reliable, fast, and secure delivery service.
